ArabicTitle: مِنْ سِفْرِ أَمْثَالِ سُلَيْمَانَ الْحَكِيمِ بَرَكَتُهُ الْمُقَدَّسَةُ فَلْتَكُنْ مَعَنَا آمِينُ . ( ٢ : ١ - ١٥ )

Hymn.Arabic: يَا ابْنِي ، إِنْ قَبِلْتَ كَلَامِي وَصُنْتَ وَصَايَايَ عِنْدَكَ ،
Hymn.English: 2:1 My son, if you receive my words, And treasure my commands within you,

Hymn.Arabic: حَتَّى تُصْغِيَ بِأُذُنِكَ إِلَى الْحِكْمَةِ ، وَتُمِيلَ قَلْبَكَ إِلَى الْفَهْمِ
Hymn.English: 2 So that you incline your ear to wisdom, And apply your heart to understanding;

Hymn.Arabic: وَتُعْطِيَهُ تَعْلِيمًا لِابْنِكَ ، إِنْ دَعَوْتَ الْفِطْنَةَ وَأَطْلَقْتَ إِلَى الْفَهْمِ صَوْتَكَ ،
Hymn.English: 3 Yes, if you cry out for discernment, And lift up your voice for understanding,

Hymn.Arabic: إِنِ الْتَمَسْتَهُ كَالْفِضَّةِ ، وَبَحَثْتَ عَنْهُ كَالْكُنُوزِ ،
Hymn.English: 4 If you seek her as silver, And search for her as for hidden treasures;

Hymn.Arabic: فَحِينَئِذٍ تَفْطَنُ لِمَخَافَةِ الرَّبِّ ، وَتُدْرِكُ مَعْرِفَةَ اللَّهِ .
Hymn.English: 5 Then you will understand the fear of the Lord, And find the knowledge of God.

Hymn.Arabic: لأنَّ الرَّبَّ يُؤْتِي الْحِكْمَةَ. وَمِنْ فَمِهِ الْعِلْمُ وَالْفِطْنَةُ.
Hymn.English: 6 For the Lord gives wisdom; From His mouth come knowledge and understanding;
7 He stores up sound wisdom for the upright; He is a shield to those who walk uprightly;

Hymn.Arabic: لِحِفْظِ مَنَاهِجِ الْعَدْلِ ، وَحِفْظِ طَرِيقِ أَصْفِيَائِهِ.
Hymn.English: 8 He guards the paths of justice, And preserves the way of His saints.

Hymn.Arabic: حِينَئِذٍ تَفْطَنُ لِلْعَدْلِ وَالْحَقِّ وَالْإِنْصَافِ وَالْإِسْتِقَامَةِ ، وَكُلَّ مَنْهَجٍ صَالِحٍ.
Hymn.English: 9 Then you will understand righteousness and justice, Equity and every good path.

Hymn.Arabic: إِذَا دَخَلَتِ الْحِكْمَةُ قَلْبَكَ ، وَلَذَّتِ الْمَعْرِفَةُ نَفْسَكَ ،
Hymn.English: 10 When wisdom enters your heart, And knowledge is pleasant to your soul,
11 Discretion will preserve you; Understanding will keep you,

Hymn.Arabic: فَيُنْقِذُكَ مِنْ طَرِيقِ السُّوءِ ، وَمِنَ الْإِنْسَانِ النَّاطِقِ بِالْخَدَائِعِ ،
Hymn.English: 12 To deliver you from the way of evil, From the man who speaks perverse things,

Hymn.Arabic: مِنَ الَّذِينَ يَتْرُكُونَ سُبُلَ الإِسْتِقَامَةِ لِيَسِيرُوا فِي طُرُقِ الظُّلْمَةِ ،
Hymn.English: 13 From those who leave the paths of uprightness To walk in the ways of darkness;

Hymn.Arabic: وَيَفْرَحُونَ بِصَنِيعِ الشَّرِ ، وَيَبْتَهِجُونَ بِخَدَائِعِ السُّوءِ ،
Hymn.English: 14 Who rejoice in doing evil, And delight in the perversity of the wicked;
15 Whose ways are crooked, And who are devious in their paths;.     Glory be to the Holy Trinity. Amen
